00025 #ifndef MULEUDPSOCKET_H
00026 #define MULEUDPSOCKET_H
00027 
00028 
00029 #include "Types.h"              // Needed for uint16 and uint32
00030 #include "ThrottledSocket.h"    // Needed for ThrottledControlSocket
00031 #include "amuleIPV4Address.h"   // Needed for amuleIPV4Address
00032 
00033 class CEncryptedDatagramSocket;
00034 class CProxyData;
00035 class CPacket;
00036 
00037 /***
00038  * This class provides a UBT governed UDP-socket.
00039  *
00040  * The CMuleUDPSocket are created with the NOWAIT option and
00041  * handle both INPUT and OUTPUT events.
00042  * 
00043  * The following additional features are provided compared to CDatagramSocketProxy:
00044  *  - Goverened by the UBT.
00045  *  - Automatic sending/receiving of packets.
00046  *  - Fallover recovery for when a socket becomes invalid (error 4).
00047  *
00048  * @see ThrottledControlSocket
00049  * @see CEncryptedDatagramSocket
00050  */
00051 class CMuleUDPSocket : public ThrottledControlSocket
00052 {
00053     
00054 public:
00063     CMuleUDPSocket(const wxString& name, int id, const amuleIPV4Address& address, const CProxyData* ProxyData = NULL);
00064     
00068     virtual ~CMuleUDPSocket();
00069 
00070     
00077     void Open();
00078     
00085     void Close();
00086     
00087     
00089     virtual void OnSend(int errorCode);
00091     virtual void OnReceive(int errorCode);
00093     virtual void OnReceiveError(int errorCode, uint32 ip, uint16 port);
00095     virtual void OnDisconnected(int errorCode);
00096 
00111     void    SendPacket(CPacket* packet, uint32 IP, uint16 port, bool bEncrypt, const uint8* pachTargetClientHashORKadID, bool bKad, uint32 nReceiverVerifyKey);
00112 
00113 
00119     bool    Ok();
00120 
00121 protected:
00129     virtual void OnPacketReceived(uint32 ip, uint16 port, byte* buffer, size_t length) = 0;
00130 
00131     
00133     SocketSentBytes  SendControlData(uint32 maxNumberOfBytesToSend, uint32 minFragSize);
00134         
00135 private:
00144     bool    SendTo(uint8_t *buffer, uint32_t length, uint32_t ip, uint16_t port);
00145 
00146 
00153     void    CreateSocket();
00154 
00158     void    DestroySocket();
00159 
00160     
00162     bool                    m_busy;
00164     wxString                m_name;
00166     int                     m_id;
00168     amuleIPV4Address        m_addr;
00170     const CProxyData*       m_proxy;
00172     wxMutex                 m_mutex;
00174     CEncryptedDatagramSocket*   m_socket;
00175     
00177     struct UDPPack
00178     {
00180         CPacket*    packet;
00182         uint32      time;
00184         uint32      IP;
00186         uint16      port;
00188         bool    bEncrypt;
00190         bool    bKad;
00191         // The verification key for RC4 encryption.
00192         uint32 nReceiverVerifyKey;
00193         // Client hash or kad ID.
00194         uint8 pachTargetClientHashORKadID[16];      
00195     } ;
00196     
00198     std::list<UDPPack> m_queue;
00199 };
